name: LizzyCraft (MC Unity Edition)
description:
Minecraft unity edition also known as LizzyCraft (changed for copyright reasons) will be a game which will be updated alot once i get some music from my musician and some normal minecraft features like trees crafting and all items.

- GreenFox (Also known as Ben) has created this game with Lizzy Walker Gaming for people to play for free.

Due to concerns  of Copyright, we are giving credit to Notch who created minecraft, for the idea for this game and Microsoft.

So we cannot officially copyright this game but still...

...thanks for downloading!
